name: Administrator
description: This is the main administrative role which serves for identifying a user as an administrator. It carries no permissions.

name: Public
description: This role is assumed for all public (anonymous) requests. Whatever is allowed here is becoming publicly accessible so be careful with it!

name: Webiny Administrator
description: This role tells the system that its owner manages Webiny installation. It carries no permissions.

name: Webiny Marketplace
description: This role tells the system that its owner is allowed to use Webiny Marketplace.

name: User Manager
description: This role allows management of users, roles and permissions.

name: API Token Manager
description: This role allows management of API tokens.

name: Logger Manager
description: This roles allows user to manage system error logger.

name: Dashboard
description: This role allows access to the dashboard module.

name: Webiny API Discoverer
description: This role allows user to discover API using Postman

name: I18N Manager
description: This role allows user to manage languages and translations.
